title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 20 ยง 137.5 - Application of rules for resident partners to nonresident partners
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 20 ยง 137.5 - Application of rules for resident partners to nonresident partners

State Regulations

Tax Law, ยง 637(e)
(a) A nonresident partner's distributive
share of partnership items is determined under section
117.3
of this Title. (b) The character of
partnership items for a nonresident partner is determined under section
117.4
of this

Title. (c) Where a special
provision in a partnership agreement (other than the provision referred to in
section
137.2
of this Part) has as its principal purpose the avoidance or evasion of New York

State personal income tax, each partner's distributive share must be determined
in accordance with the provisions of section
117.5
of this Title. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 20
ยง
137.5

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
